title: Will a Recount Decide Lauren Boebert’s Race? It Could Take Weeks to Sort Out.
description: As of Friday, Ms. Boebert, a far-right provocateur in the House, led by less than 1,200 votes over the Democrat Adam Frisch in Colorado’s Third District race.
dc:creator: Neil Vigdor
media:credit: William Woody for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado, a Republican, and her challenger, Adam Frisch, are locked in a tighter than expected race for Colorado’s Third Congressional District.
